Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I struggle with this at times...part of me will truly believe I shouldn’t *need* to eat, at least not for quite awhile. It can fuel anger with my body and mind and the world. For me it’s an emotional state/belief that it’s hard to logic out of. I find that consistently acting opposite to the emotion can help. Though so far I seem to cycle back into it every few weeks/months.
